name: citadel-faucet-server
description: A facet to asset with testing the pioneer SDK
author: highlander <bithighlander@gmail.com>

scripts.refresh: rm -Rf node_modules dist api .quasar && npm i
scripts.api-dev: nodemon --watch 'src-api/controllers/*.ts' --exec npm run build:all && node dist/main -W
scripts.build:swagger: mkdir -p api && mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa swagger
scripts.build:swagger-local: mkdir -p api && mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa swagger --configuration tsoaLocal.json
scripts.build:swagger-stage: mkdir -p api && mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa swagger --configuration tsoaStage.json
scripts.build:swagger-prod: mkdir -p api && mkdir -p api/dist && tsoa swagger --configuration tsoaProd.json
scripts.build:all-local: npm run build:routes-local && npm run build:swagger-local && npm run build:ts && npm run build:web
scripts.build:all-stage: npm run build:routes && npm run build:swagger && npm run build:ts && npm run build:web
scripts.build:all-prod: npm run build:routes && npm run build:swagger && npm run build:ts && npm run build:web
scripts.docker:push:all: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:push
